title: The Adventures of Pit Perez: Guiding Light of the City

story.text: Pit Perez discovers a strange glowing rock while leading a tour in the local caves, which grants him the ability to emit blinding light from his hands.
Testing his new powers, Pit prevents a mugging in a dark alley, illuminating the area and disorienting the attackers.
Pit designs a costume that can harness and control his light powers for greater effects, to use in future rescues and missions.
News of a mysterious 'Guiding Light' hero starts circulating, and Pit uses his night to guide lost hikers back to safety in the mountains.
A major power outage hits the city; Pit guides medical teams through darkened streets to attend emergencies, becoming a beacon in literal darkness.
Encountering his first villain, a figure who controls shadows, Pit struggles but ultimately uses his light to disperse the darkness and capture the foe.
Celebrated as a hero, Pit commits to using his powers to guide those in need, drawing more from his hobby of guiding than ever before.

ending: Thus, Pit Perez shone not just light, but also hope, into the lives of many, proving that even the smallest spark can illuminate the darkest nights.
moral: The power to light the way in times of darkness lies not just in strength, but in the heart.
